title: Fix BLE
message:
Fix BLE

BLE connection did not work, because IncomingPacketHandler loop was
interrupted before connection was established. Also, since BLE does not
support Param and Logg subsystems, "Connected" is the final state, not
"Setup Finished".

title: Fix joystick not returning to bottom when coming back from phone being off.
message:
Fix joystick not returning to bottom when coming back from phone being off.

The code was calling autoReturn() before the view had been laid out, so movementRadius was zero, and the bottom was the center.  I'm now triggering another autoReturn in onLayout() if the movementRadius changes.

title: Some iml file change that Android Studio did...
message: Some iml file change that Android Studio did...

title: Better implementation of "Touch control full travel", where, only for the…
message:
Better implementation of "Touch control full travel", where, only for the onscreen touch controller, the joystick used for thrust goes all the way to the bottom.

This simply remaps the range reported to the Controls class from (-1 to 1) to (0 to 1). This is mostly to avoid complexifying many other cases that assume that resetting both analog sticks to 0 is the correct action.  Unfortunately it means other types of controllers would need to implement this themselves, if they wanted to.
